name: CPR Backend
description: testing headless craft with pusher and react/next.js SSG

ENVIRONMENT.description: The environment should be 'dev' or 'production'. If you ask me, I'd go with 'dev' to have some debug tools.

SECURITY_KEY.description: Craft needs a random security key. Just click in the input field below and roll with your head over your keyboard. Make sure that the field is filled in with at least 8 digits.
